s.hi: DS : What would be a bigger turn-off for you in bed , someone who was overly flatulent , or someone who spoke in a baby voice ?

p.s: I could get over the baby voice , but the flatulence is a tough one to stomach .

s.hi: DS : Do you have a favorite curse word ?

p.s: Nothing is springing to mind .
Nope .

s.hi: DS : If you had to choose between the destruction of the entire continent of Africa or the entire continent of Asia , which would you choose ?

p.s: Oh , God .
So , population-wise .
It ’s tempting…I think that is the only way to choose .
Killing a greater number of people has to be a greater evil .
That ’s maybe the bottom line .
I would hate to make that decision .

s.hi: DS : What are traits you respect in a woman ?

p.s: The same traits I look for in anybody else in the world : kindness , thoughtfulness .

s.hi: DS : It does n’t differ in men ?

p.s: No. Being a nice human being is what I look for in anybody .

s.hi: DS : What ’s your most treasured possession ?

p.s: I have a massive record collection I obsess over , and it would be hard to let that go .

I have n't been able to see any in the last couple of months , but in the last year I went through a complete
Herzog
obsession .
I watched all of his films , I read Herzog on Herzog and even read Kinsky ’s biography .
Almost all of his films are incredible .

s.hi: DS : What difficult question in an interview do you anticipate but are never asked ?

p.s: I actually do n’t anticipate the difficult ones , which is why when you asked me to destroy one continent I did n’t see that one coming .

s.hi: DS : What question are you tired of answering ?

p.s: The ones I get asked the most , and I do n’t mind answering them , but I do n’t relish answering them : I had to change my name from Manitoba to Caribou a couple years back due a law suit .
I do n't mind this one anymore , but at first I got asked that in every interview .
And also , the connection between mathematics and music , which you asked me in a form .
That ’s a valid question , though , because it ’s a point of interest about the way that I work .
The lawsuit is like reciting a history of facts I ’d rather forget .

s.hi: DS : In the last year , where have you drawn most of your influence , and you ca n’t have been listening to them beyond a year ago .

p.s: The big thing for me in the last year that is reflected in this album more than in previous ones is songwriting .
I never wrote songs I just built tracks out of loops .
There were melodies in them , but there was n’t any structure to the songs .
One artist I did n’t ’ listen to before a year ago was Ariel Pink who is a lo-fi indie songwriter and producer .
His production is amazing , but it turns people off because it ’s so lo-fi ; but also , his song-writing is amazing .
